app.title: Optimal Build Studio
app.tagline: Accelerate compliance and design coordination across your CAD workflows.

feasibility.description: Kick off planning studies with project context, rule packs and buildability checks.

uploader.title: Upload building layouts
uploader.subtitle: Drop DXF/DWG files to launch the parse pipeline and monitor overlays in real-time.
uploader.dropHint: Drag & drop or paste files here
uploader.error: Something went wrong while parsing the CAD file.

detection.title: Floor and unit detection preview
detection.subtitle: Review detected spaces, approve batches and understand overlay impact.
detection.empty: No units match the current filters.
detection.locked: Zone is locked. Unlock to update review status.

pipelines.title: Default pipeline suggestions
pipelines.subtitle: Leverage rule packs tailored to the detected overlays and topics.

panels.rulePackEmpty: Rules will appear after the first overlays are processed.
panels.exportSubtitle: Deliver CAD overlays and compliance notes in preferred formats.

wizard.title: Feasibility assessment
wizard.description: Screen an address against zoning overlays, calculate buildable capacity and surface the clauses that drive the result.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

assumptions.title: Assumptions
assumptions.subtitle: Tweak the inputs the engine uses to derive height limits and net saleable area.

errors.required: Enter a value to update the estimate.
errors.invalid: Enter a number greater than zero.

states.idle: Enter a seeded address to load the zoning profile.
states.empty: We could not match this address to a seeded parcel yet.
states.partial: Zone resolved but no published rules are tagged to this parcel.

accessibility.noZone: No zone resolved for this address.
accessibility.updated: Feasibility updated for zone {{zone}} with {{overlays}} overlays.
